title: Treating the Mental Health Effects of COVID-19: The Need for At-Home Neurotherapeutics Is Now.
text: Treating the Mental Health Effects of COVID-19: The Need for At-Home Neurotherapeutics Is Now.

similar.title: The role of Mental Health Home Hospitalization Care during the COVID-19 pandemic.
text: The role of Mental Health Home Hospitalization Care during the COVID-19 pandemic.

The 2019 novel coronavirus disease emerged in China in late 2019-early 2020 and it is spreading rapidly worldwide (1). Amongst the Spanish public health interventions aimed at reducing the transmission rate, home confinement has been enforced (2). The Royal Decree 463/2020 stated a 15-day national emergency states starting on March 15, that has since been extended (3).
